de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter
Class BreakItem

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter.AbstractItem
      de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter.BreakItem

final class BreakItem
extends AbstractItem

This class represents breaks that can be inserted into the item list of a pretty string builder using the PrettyStringBuilder.addBreak() method and indicate that the presenter may start a new line at this offset.

Version:
$Rev: 277 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
AbstractItem, PrettyStringBuilder.addBreak()

Field Summary
static BreakItem BREAK_ITEM
          The single instance of the BreakItem class, which is used to reduce the overhead of allocating several (empty) BreakItem instances.

(package private)  int determineStringLength()
          Returns the length of the string in characters required to serialize this item to a pretty string.
